description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * JOB DESCRIPTION:
              
              - Selling plastic bags to Japan
              
              - Searching new customers in Japanese Plastics Packaging market
              
              - To maintain current sales network in Japan
              
              - Developing and enhance relationship with existing and new customers.
              
              - Prepare and be in charge of the whole sales process.
              
              - Be responsible for export – import process.
              
              - Make sure daily/ weekly/ monthly report to head office on time,
              
              - Contact manufacturing department to place order
              
              - Prepare marketing events (exhibition, meeting customers)
              
              - Other tasks assigned by managers
              
              * WORKING TIME & LOCATION:
              
              - Working time: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM on Monday to Saturday morning, lunch time: 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM
              
              - Working location: 7th Floor, Hong Ha Building, 37 Ngo Quyen, Hoan Kiem district, Hanoi
              

              * BENEFIT:
              
              - High salary and attractive commission
              
              - Have opportunities of business travel in Japan
              
              - Working in professional environment, good conditions will be provided to promote personal abilities, with opportunities for promotion and personal development
              
              - The welfare package is fully in accordance with the Labor Law, Corporate Law, Law of the State the current social insurance
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - 1 years experience working as sales executive
              
              - Experienced in plastics industry and plastic packaging is preferred
              
              - Experienced working with Japanese customers and market is preferred
              
              - Export – Import knowledge and experiences
              
              - Fluent in Japanese (at least N2)
              
              - Knowing English or Vietnamese is a plus
              
              - To be Vietnamese or Japanese
              
              - Sales skill
              
              - Communication skill
              
              - Customer relationship management
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
